itunes:title: #49 - Self Care and Herbal Medicine with Lindsay Kluge
title: #49 - Self Care and Herbal Medicine with Lindsay Kluge
description:
Herbalist and nutrition expert, Lindsay Kluge of Ginger Tonic Botanicals, is joining us today on Being Boss to talk about herbal medicine, the mind-body connection, and self-care. Because even as you're doing the work to be boss, it's important to make sure you're treating your body right too!

—

Listen to more Being Boss shows on our website, on Apple Podcasts, or wherever you listen to podcasts.

Follow Being Boss on Instagram: @beingbossclub

Join the Being Boss Community: beingboss.club/community
